word_mean: 胡蜂，黄蜂：胡蜂科(Vespidae)中所有的具有膜翅的、会螫刺的昆虫均属之，其代表属为胡蜂属(Vespa)。其毒液中含有组胺、5-羟色胺等

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wæfs, wæps, wæsp, of West Germanic origin, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin vespa; perhaps related to weave (from the web-like form of its nest)

entry.def: A wasp is an insect with wings and yellow and black stripes across its body. Wasps have a painful sting like a bee but do not produce honey.

means.word_mean: 1. social or solitary hymenopterans typically having a slender body with the abdomen attached by a narrow stalk and having a formidable sting
